title: Genomics could better match treatments to pancreatic cancer patients

title_detail.value: Genomics could better match treatments to pancreatic cancer patients

summary: Pancreatic cancer is a grim diagnosis, but this new study, the largest of its kind, identifies genomic markers that could increase survival by better matching chemotherapy drugs to patients.

summary_detail.value: Pancreatic cancer is a grim diagnosis, but this new study, the largest of its kind, identifies genomic markers that could increase survival by better matching chemotherapy drugs to patients.
